name: Chokkan Crash Bandicoot
summary: Chokkan♪ Crash Bandicoot (Crash Bandicoot Intuition♪ in English) is a game released for the DoCoMo SH904 mobile phone series in 2007, only in Japan. It is a sequel to Crash Boom Bang! that uses motion-sensing gameplay. It has more minigames than Crash Boom Bang! and uses the same graphics as it.
